title: BlackRock Cuts Hundreds of Jobs, Trimming About 1% of Staff
description: BlackRock Inc. is cutting hundreds of jobs across the company, becoming the latest Wall Street firm to rein in headcount in recent weeks.
content: BlackRock Inc. is cutting hundreds of jobs across the company, becoming the latest Wall Street firm to rein in headcount in recent weeks.
